description: Try our easy to follow Summer Rolls recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Summer Rolls Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Submerge 1 rice paper wrapper in a bowl of lukewarm water until soft. Lay on a clean tea towel. Place some noodles, vegetables, tofu and 1 mint leaf across wrapper close to you. Fold bottom up over filling and fold both sides in. Roll once, then place another mint leaf on the roll and finish rolling. Place on a tray lined with plastic wrap. Repeat with remaining wrappers and filling. Serve with dipping sauce.
